Key Match Events: Mexico advanced 4-2 on penalty kicks after Honduras gave up the tying goal in the 10th minute of added time
Post-Match Reflections: The world press came down hard on Iván Barton for his decisions in the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Iván Barton added 11 minutes of stoppage time in the second half between Mexico and Honduras
Barton has a long history of controversies in his refereeing career
Others: Barton was criticized for not showing Lionel Messi a yellow card in a game against Orlando City
Barton awarded three penalties in the first leg of the 2022 CONCACAF Champions League Final between Seattle Sounders FC and UNAM
